name: Josh
description: I am really a sincere and honest person.am caring, kind, friendly very easy to get along with am, social, romantic, passionate.smart, intelligent, cool headed, adaptive, have a big heart and i do believe in the truth and honest.I am a very sincere and honest person and i am looking for someone to love and share my heart with.Someone to show every bit of my heart with and someone i know who is wanting everything and is not scared to love. I am really looking for a woman who’s completely honest and sincere about her words and feelings who’s ready for a long term relationship.who’s ready to build up a family with someone real..i want a woman who i know i can have faith and completely trust with all my heart
